import React from 'react' import Menu from './Menu' function Curriculum () { return (

CURRICULUM VITAE

{/*

LANGUAGES

  • Italian - Native
  • English - Fluent
  • Spanish - Fluent

SKILLS

  • HTML, CSS, JavaScript;
  • Data Analysis;
  • Team, Budget and Time Management;
  • Agile & Project Management;
  • Logistical & Operational Planning;
  • Office 365 skills;
  • Communication skills;
  • Figma & WordPress;

EDUCATION

  • From 03/2022 - Current

    Web Development and Project Management in Codecademy and Udemy, online
  • 2012 - 2013

    Chemistry & Pharmaceutical Technologies, University of Oriental Piedmont, Italy
  • 2007 - 2012

    Industrial Chemical Diploma,

    ITIS Salvatore “Lirelli”, Italy

CERTIFICATES

Check all my Certificates

CONTACT ME

My contacts

PROFILE

Multilingual, self-motivated and creative-thinker professional. I have extensive experience in managing medium to large teams and dealing with clients. My ability to think outside of the box led me to challenge myself, adapt to transformation and re-skill to follow my passion for software development. I am a great team-player and know how to be highly efficient while still spreading a good humor. As a focused and determined employee I have the ambition to complete every task to the best result.

WORK EXPERIENCE

Bartender Tenerife Spain | Nov 2021 - Current | Zico’s Bar

  • Complete renovation of the bar structure;
  • 60% increase in customers and sales;
  • Teaching staff how to think and manage the structure;

Facility Manager Italy | April 2021 – Set 2021 | Camping Free Beach

  • Reached the estimated target in three quarters of the scheduled time;
  • Obtaining an internationally renowned sponsor;
  • Promotion from supervisor to facility manager in 2 months thanks to the skills used;

Facility Manager Italy | Winter Season (Dec - Apr) 2017-18, 2018-19, 2019-20 & Jun ‘20 - Sep ‘20 | “Gordon's Pub” at Chalet du Lys & SPA****

  • Individual management of the structure and the creation of a new staff;
  • complete confidence in my skills and budget management by the owners;
  • Achieved three times the turnover from expectations;

Facility Manager Italy | Summer Season (Apr - Sep) 2017,

2018, 2019 & March ‘20 - May ‘20 | Club del Sole S.r.l.

  • Use of my skills for the creation of a solid and healthy working environment that has been

    collaborating for many years to achieve the planned goals;
  • Direct promotion in the first months for the management of the company's facilities

    and consequent confidence in my abilities;
  • Average increase of plant performance by 45% each year;

Assistant Manager London, UK | Oct. 2013 – March 2017 |

Starbucks Coffee

  • Rapid climb up the company hierarchy due to my commitment and perseverance in learning;
  • Reward to the store every three months due to constant increase in turnover;
  • Opportunity given by this company to teach colleagues from different stores

    after only two years that I had started working;
*/}
) } export default Curriculum
